document.full_text: fifa president sepp blatter, facing a deepening corruption scandal including accusations that qatar bought the right to stage the 2022 world cup, denied there was a crisis and described the problems as local difficulties on monday.
document.title: fifa scandal deepens, blatter denies crisis talk
lines_and_colors: fifa president sepp blatter, facing a deepening corruption scandal including accusations that qatar bought the right to stage the 2022 world cup, denied there was a crisis and described the problems as local difficulties on monday.
